strings.Value: "You have all the reason in the world not to trust people."
[Hold Octavia] "Thank you for saying it. I love you."
[Pull away] "After everything you've done to me, it's hard to believe you. What if you decide to test me again?"
[Pull away] "You know what? I'm tired of your games. Enough. I can't take it any more. It's over."
"What is this? Another test? You wish to see how I'll react to an apology?"
{n}Octavia touches your shoulder hesitantly.{/n} "Listen, I... I need to tell you something."

"No, not like that... I want to apologize. I was unfair to you. All that flirtation for show, to see if you'd be jealous... Stupid scenes to test how much you'd take... It was cruel and stupid. I'm sorry."
"I know. I did it on purpose. I'm really sorry. I was afraid you'd turn out to be another tyrant, and hurt me... I didn't even think about what you were feeling. I'm a terrible egoist."
"Yes... But I punish the people who are close to me for the evil that strangers did to me. I knew you loved me... But I couldn't find it in my heart to trust you."
{n}Instead of answering, the girl clings to you tightly.{/n}
"I... Understand. I hope you can forgive me. I love you so much. And I'm so afraid of losing you."
"I... Understand. I'm sorry." {n}Sniffling, the half-elf turns away.{/n}
"What? No, no! Oh... You see what I've done? I'm being sincere, and you're looking for the trick in my words. That's exactly what I'm apologizing for."
